00020 namespace CALICE

00022   SiPMCalibrateProcessor aSiPMCalibrateProcessor;

00029   SiPMCalibrateProcessor::SiPMCalibrateProcessor():Processor("SiPMCalibrateProcessor")
00030   {
00031     _description = "Does calibration of AHCal hits";
00032 
00033     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00034                                "Name of the input collection",
00035                                _inputColName,
00036                                std::string("CALDAQ_ADCCol"));
00037 
00038     registerProcessorParameter("OutputAhcHitCollectionName",
00039                                "Name of the output AHCal hit collection, of type CalorimeterHit",
00040                                _ahcHitOutputColName,
00041                                std::string("AhcCalorimeter_Hits"));
00042 
00043     registerProcessorParameter("OutputAhcAmplCollectionName",
00044                                "Name of the output AHCal amplitude collection, of type LCGenericObject",
00045                                _ahcAmplOutputColName,
00046                                std::string("AhcAmplitude"));
00047 
00048     registerProcessorParameter("HitAmplRelationName",
00049                                "Name of the output LCRelation between CalorimeterHit and AhcAmplitude",
00050                                _hitAmplRelationColName,
00051                                std::string("AhcHitAmplitudeRelation"));
00052 
00053     registerProcessorParameter( "MappingProcessorName" ,
00054                                 "Name of the MappingProcessor instance that provides"
00055                                 " the geometry of the detector." ,
00056                                 _mappingProcessorName,
00057                                 std::string("MyMappingProcessor") ) ;
00058 
00059     registerProcessorParameter( "CellDescriptionProcessorName" ,
00060                                 "Name of the CellDescriptionProcessor instance that provides"
00061                                 " the corrected position of the cells." ,
00062                                 _cellDescriptionProcessorName,
00063                                 std::string("MyCellDescriptionProcessor") ) ;
00064 
00065     registerProcessorParameter( "SiPMCalibrationsProcessorName" ,
00066                                 "Name of the SiPMCalibrationsProcessor that provides"
00067                                 " the calibrations of the AHCal tiles." ,
00068                                 _calibProcessorName,
00069                                 std::string("MySiPMCalibrationsProcessor") ) ;
00070 
00071     registerProcessorParameter( "SiPMTemperatureProcessorName" ,
00072                                 "Name of the SiPMTemperatureProcessor that provides"
00073                                 " the AHCal temperature provider." ,
00074                                 _temperatureProcessorName,
00075                                 std::string("MySiPMTemperatureProcessor") ) ;
00076    
00077     registerProcessorParameter( "SimRecRelationName" ,
00078                                 "Name of the relation between the Mokka SimCalorimeterHits"
00079                                 " and reconstructed CalorimeterHits",
00080                                 _simRecRelationColName,
00081                                 std::string("AhcSimRecRelation") ) ;
00082  
00083     registerProcessorParameter( "SimHitName" ,
00084                                 "Name of the Mokka SimCalorimeterHits collection",
00085                                 _simHitColName,
00086                                 std::string("hcalSD") ) ;
00087  
00088     registerProcessorParameter("PedestalSubtraction",
00089                                "apply (1) or ignore (0) the pedestal subtraction",
00090                                _pedestalSubtraction,
00091                                (bool) true);
00092 
00093     registerProcessorParameter("ZeroSuppression",
00094                                "apply (1) or ignore (0) the MIP threshold cut",
00095                                _zeroSuppression,
00096                                (bool) true);
00097 
00098     registerProcessorParameter("MipToGeVFactor", "AHCal conversion factor from MIP to GeV",
00099                                _mipToGeVFactor,
00100                                (float) 0.0255);
00101 
00102     registerProcessorParameter("MipCut", "Minimal energy deposition in "
00103                                "units of MIP to keep hit, applied only if ZeroSuppression==1.",
00104                                _mipCut,
00105                                (float) 0.4);
00106 
00107     registerProcessorParameter("doMipTemperatureCorrection",
00108                                "Do MIP temperature correction",
00109                                _doMipTempCorr,
00110                                (bool) true);
00111 
00112     registerProcessorParameter("doGainTemperatureCorrection",
00113                                "Do gain temperature correction",
00114                                _doGainTempCorr,
00115                                (bool) true);
00116 
00117     registerProcessorParameter("doSaturationCorrection",
00118                                "Do saturation correction",
00119                                _doSaturationCorr,
00120                                (bool) true);
00121 
00122     registerProcessorParameter("doErrorCalculation",
00123                                "Do error calculation",
00124                                _doErrorCalculation,
00125                                (bool) false);
00126 
00127     registerProcessorParameter("doWriteOnlyRawAmplitude",
00128                                "Write only the raw amplitude to the output collection"
00129                                " (i.e. don't do any calibration, used for creation of noise files)",
00130                                _doWriteOnlyRawAmplitude,
00131                                (bool) false);
00132 
00133     registerProcessorParameter("filterDeadCells",
00134                                "Filter dead cells",
00135                                _filterDeadCells,
00136                                (bool) true);
00137 
00138     registerProcessorParameter("filterDefaultCells",
00139                                "Filter cells that use some default value in calibration.",
00140                                _filterDefaultCells,
00141                                (bool) false);
00142 
00143     registerOptionalParameter( "ScaleEnergy" ,
00144                                "scale factor for the energy",
00145                                _energyScaleFactor,
00146                                (float)1. ) ;
00147                                
00148     registerProcessorParameter("correctDefaultGainTofixedLightYield",
00149                                "Correct light yield for cells with default gain value in calibration.",
00150                                _correctDefaultGainToLY,
00151                                (bool) false);
00152                                
00153     registerProcessorParameter( "fixedLightYieldForCorrection" ,
00154                                "Fixed light yield for cells with default gain value in calibration.",
00155                                _fixedLY,
00156                                (float)15. ) ;
00157                                
00158   }

00160   /*                                                             */
00161   /*                                                             */
00162   /*                                                             */
00163   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00164   void SiPMCalibrateProcessor::init()
00165   {
00166     printParameters();
00167 
00168     std::stringstream message;
00169     bool error = false;
00170 
00171     _isFirstEvent = true;
00172     _isDATA = false;
00173     _isMC = false;
00174 
00175     _mapper = dynamic_cast<const Mapper*>(MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName));
00176     if ( !_mapper )
00177       {
00178         message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName
00179                 << ") did not return a valid mapper." << endl;
00180         error = true;
00181       }
00182 
00183     _calibContainer = SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::getCalibrations(_calibProcessorName);
00184     if ( ! _calibContainer )
00185       {
00186         message << "init(): SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::getCalibrations("<< _calibProcessorName
00187                 << ") did not return a valid MappedContainer." <<endl;
00188         error = true;
00189       }
00190 
00191     _cellDescriptions = CellDescriptionProcessor::getCellDescriptions(_cellDescriptionProcessorName);
00192     if ( ! _cellDescriptions ) 
00193       {
00194         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot obtain cell descriptions from "<<_cellDescriptionProcessorName
00195                      <<" Maybe, processor is not present" << endl;
00196         error = true;
00197       }
00198     
00199     if (error)
00200       {
00201         streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00202         throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00203       }
00204 
00205     _scaleEnergy = parameterSet("ScaleEnergy");
00206     _createSimRecRelation = (parameterSet("SimRecRelationName") && parameterSet("SimHitName"));
00207   }
00208 
00209   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00210   /*                                                             */
00211   /*                                                             */
00212   /*                                                             */
00213   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00214   void SiPMCalibrateProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent *evt)
00215   {
00216     std::stringstream message;
00217     bool error=false;
00218 
00219     if (error)
00220       {
00221         streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00222         throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00223       }
00224 
00225     LCCollection *inputCol = NULL;
00226     try
00227       {
00228         inputCol = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00229       }
00230     catch (EVENT::DataNotAvailableException &e)
00231       {
00232         streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "missing collection "
00233                       <<_inputColName<<endl<<e.what()<<endl;
00234         return;
00235       }
00236 
00237     /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00238     /*                                                                      */
00239     /*       start loop over input collection                               */
00240     /*                                                                      */
00241     /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00242     int noElem = inputCol->getNumberOfElements();
00243     if (noElem <= 0) return;
00244 
00245     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" \n\n=========================Start to process event "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<endl;
00246     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"inputcol "<<_inputColName<<" has "<<noElem<<" hits"<<endl;
00247 
00248     LCCollection *ahcHitOutputCol  = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT);
00249     /*we want to save the position, and this can only be done if the CHBIT_LONG bit is set*/
00250     ahcHitOutputCol->setFlag(ahcHitOutputCol->getFlag() | 1 << LCIO::CHBIT_LONG );
00251     LCCollection *ahcAmplOutputCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00252     LCRelationNavigator relationNavigator(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT, LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00253 
00254     if (_createSimRecRelation == true)
00255       _recoContainer = new MappedContainer<CalorimeterHitImpl>(_mapper, false);
00256 
00257 
00258     /*get the collection type and use it to distinguish between data and Monte Carlo;
00259      if collectionType = LCGENERICOBJECT => AdcBlock => data
00260      else if collectionType = CALORIMETERHIT => Monte Carlo*/
00261     const std::string collectionType = inputCol->getTypeName();
00262     std::string outputEncodingString = "";
00263 
00264 
00265     DecoderSet *decoder = _calibContainer->getDecoder();
00266     decoder->setCellIDEncoding(inputCol->getParameters().getStringVal(LCIO::CellIDEncoding));
00267 
00268     if( _isFirstEvent == true && inputCol != 0)
00269       {
00270         if(collectionType == "LCGenericObject"){_isDATA = true;}
00271         else if(collectionType == "CalorimeterHit"){_isMC = true;}
00272         _isFirstEvent = false;
00273       }
00274 
00275  
00276     if (_isDATA)/*if data*/
00277       {
00278         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < (unsigned int)noElem; ++i)
00279           {
00280             const AdcBlock adcBlock(inputCol->getElementAt(i));
00281                     
00282             for (short chip = 0; chip < 12; ++chip)
00283               {
00284                 const int daqChannelID = decoder->getDAQID(adcBlock.getCrateID(),//crate 
00285                                                            adcBlock.getSlotID(), //slot, 
00286                                                            adcBlock.getBoardFrontEnd(), //fe, 
00287                                                            chip, 
00288                                                            adcBlock.getMultiplexPosition()//channel
00289                                                            );
00290                 
00291                 SiPMCalibrations *calibration = _calibContainer->getByDAQID(daqChannelID);
00292                 if (calibration == NULL) 
00293                   {
00294                     continue;
00295                   }
00296 
00297                 streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "\n\nStart calibrating hit with crate/slot/fe/chip/chan "
00298                               << adcBlock.getCrateID() << "/" << adcBlock.getSlotID() 
00299                               << "/" << adcBlock.getBoardFrontEnd() << "/" << chip 
00300                               << "/" << adcBlock.getMultiplexPosition() << endl;
00301                 
00302                 outputEncodingString = calibration->getCellIDEncoding();
00303                 const float rawEnergy = (float)adcBlock.getAdcVal(chip);
00304                 
00305                 /*do the energy calibration*/
00306                 streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"------------------------------------"<<endl;
00307                 streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n before calibrateEnergyAndFillOutputCollections"<<endl;
00308 
00309                 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00310                 /*in case of writing the noise files, we only need the raw amplitude to 
00311                  be saved in the output collection*/
00312                 if (_doWriteOnlyRawAmplitude)
00313                   {
00314                     SimpleValue *pedestalContainer = calibration->getPedestal();
00315                     if (pedestalContainer == NULL) 
00316                       {
00317                         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << " SKIP -- no pedestal available: " << endl;
00318                         return;
00319                       }
00320                     float pedestal = pedestalContainer->getValue();
00321 
00322                     int cellID = calibration->getCellID();
00323 
00324                     CalorimeterHitImpl *newHit = new CalorimeterHitImpl();
00325                     newHit->setEnergy(rawEnergy - pedestal);
00326                     newHit->setCellID0(cellID);
00327                     
00328                     /*add collection of AHCal raw hits to the event*/
00329                     ahcHitOutputCol->addElement(newHit);
00330                     
00331                     const string encodingString = calibration->getCellIDEncoding();
00332                     LCParameters &param = ahcHitOutputCol->parameters();
00333                     param.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding, encodingString);
00334                     
00335                     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" \n output collection "<<_ahcHitOutputColName<<" has "
00336                                  <<ahcHitOutputCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements"<<endl;
00337                     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"=====================\n\n" << endl;
00338                     }
00339                 
00340                 else 
00341                   {
00342                     this->calibrateEnergyAndFillOutputCollections(calibration, rawEnergy,
00343                                                                   ahcHitOutputCol, ahcAmplOutputCol, 
00344                                                                   relationNavigator);
00345                   }
00346                 
00347               }/*--------------- end loop over chips-------------------------*/
00348           }/*--------------end loop over input collection elements ----------------------*/
00349       }/*------------------- end if data --------------------------------*/
00350 
00351     else if (_isMC)/*Monte Carlo*/
00352       {
00353         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < (unsigned int)noElem; ++i)
00354           {
00355             CalorimeterHit *digiHit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(inputCol->getElementAt(i));
00356             int cellID = digiHit->getCellID0();
00357 
00358 
00359             //decoder->setCellIDEncoding(encodingString);
00360             //decoder->setCellIDEncoding(inputCol->getParameters().getStringVal(LCIO::CellIDEncoding));
00361 
00362             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n---------------------------------------------------------"<<endl;
00363             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"encodingString: "<<inputCol->getParameters().getStringVal(LCIO::CellIDEncoding)
00364                          <<" of collection "<<_inputColName
00365                          <<" with "<<inputCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements"
00366                          <<endl;
00367             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" \nencoding string of mapper: "<< _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellIDEncoding()<<endl;
00368 
00369 
00370             _mapper->getDecoder()->setCellIDEncoding(inputCol->getParameters().getStringVal(LCIO::CellIDEncoding));
00371             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"i="<<i<<" digiHit: I/J/K="<<decoder->getIFromCellID(cellID)
00372                          <<"/"<<decoder->getJFromCellID(cellID)
00373                          <<"/"<<decoder->getKFromCellID(cellID)
00374                          <<", module="<<_mapper->getModuleFromCellID(cellID)
00375                          <<endl;
00376             
00377 
00378             SiPMCalibrations *calibration = _calibContainer->getByCellID(cellID);
00379             if (calibration == NULL)
00380               {
00381                 streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"  no calibration found for hit I/J/K="
00382                              <<decoder->getIFromCellID(cellID)
00383                              <<"/"<<decoder->getJFromCellID(cellID)
00384                              <<"/"<<decoder->getKFromCellID(cellID)
00385                              <<endl;
00386                 continue;
00387               }
00388 
00389             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" encoding string of SiPMCalibrations: "<<calibration->getCellIDEncoding()<<endl;
00390             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"cellID from digi hit:    "<<cellID<<endl;
00391             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"cellID from calibration: "<<calibration->getCellID()<<endl;
00392             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"calibration: "<<calibration<<" for I/J/K "<<decoder->getIFromCellID(cellID)
00393                          <<"/"<<decoder->getJFromCellID(cellID)
00394                          <<"/"<<decoder->getKFromCellID(cellID)
00395                          <<endl;
00396 
00397             outputEncodingString = calibration->getCellIDEncoding();
00398             const float rawEnergy  = digiHit->getEnergy();
00399 
00400             /*do the energy calibration*/
00401             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n before calibrateEnergyAndFillOutputCollections"<<endl;
00402 
00403             this->calibrateEnergyAndFillOutputCollections(calibration, rawEnergy,
00404                                                           ahcHitOutputCol, ahcAmplOutputCol, relationNavigator);
00405           }/*---------- end of loop over input collection elements ------------------------*/
00406       }/*------------------- end if MC --------------------------------*/
00407     else/*--------- not supported (neither DATA nor MC)----------------*/
00408       {
00409         streamlog_out(ERROR)<<" Nothing to be done for collections of type "<<collectionType<<endl;
00410         return;
00411       }
00412         
00413 
00414 
00415     /* add AHCal collection to event*/
00416     //move relationNavigator here
00417     /*add the LCRelation between CalorimeterHit and AhcAmplitude to the event*/
00418     if (ahcHitOutputCol->getNumberOfElements() > 0)
00419       {
00420         LCParameters &param = ahcHitOutputCol->parameters();
00421         param.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding, outputEncodingString);
00422 
00423         evt->addCollection(ahcHitOutputCol, _ahcHitOutputColName.c_str());
00424         evt->addCollection(relationNavigator.createLCCollection(), _hitAmplRelationColName);
00425         /*checkHitAmplRelation(evt);*/
00426         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" Collection "<<_ahcHitOutputColName<<" added to the event"<<endl;
00427       } else {delete ahcHitOutputCol;}
00428 
00429     /* add AhcAmplitude collection to event*/
00430     if (ahcAmplOutputCol->getNumberOfElements() > 0)
00431       {
00432         evt->addCollection(ahcAmplOutputCol, _ahcAmplOutputColName.c_str());
00433         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" Collection "<<_ahcAmplOutputColName<<" added to the event"<<endl;      
00434       } else {delete ahcAmplOutputCol;}
00435 
00436 
00437     /*----------------------------------------------------------------
00438       for the relation between CalorimeterHits and SimCalorimeterHits
00439       ------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00440     if (_createSimRecRelation == true)
00441       {
00442         this->createSimRecRelation(evt);
00443         delete _recoContainer;
00444       }
00445  
00446 
00447   }
00448 
00449   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00450   /*                                                             */
00451   /*                                                             */
00452   /*                                                             */
00453   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00454   void SiPMCalibrateProcessor::calibrateEnergyAndFillOutputCollections(SiPMCalibrations* calibration, 
00455                                                                        const float rawEnergy,
00456                                                                        LCCollection* ahcHitOutputCol,
00457                                                                        LCCollection* ahcAmplOutputCol,
00458                                                                        LCRelationNavigator &relationNavigator)
00459   {
00460    const SiPMCalibrationStatusBits bits = SiPMCalibrationStatusBits( calibration->getStatus() );
00461     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  STATUS bits: " << bits << endl;
00462     
00463     if ( _filterDeadCells && bits.isDead() ) 
00464       {
00465         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << " SKIP -- channel is marked as dead: " << endl;
00466         return;
00467       }
00468 
00469     if ( _filterDefaultCells && bits.hasDefault() ) 
00470       {
00471         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << " SKIP -- channel has default calibration: " << endl;
00472         return;
00473       }
00474     
00475     /*-------------------- calibration coefficients --------------*/
00476     LinearFitCompound *lfcMIP            = calibration->getMIP();
00477     LinearFitCompound *lfcGain           = calibration->getGain();
00478     SimpleValue *interCalibContainer     = calibration->getInterCalibration();
00479     SatCorrFunction *saturationContainer = calibration->getSaturationCorrection();
00480     
00481     /*------------------------------------------------
00482       get pedestal
00483       -----------------------------------------------*/
00484     float pedestal      = 0;
00485     float pedestalError = 0;
00486     
00487     SimpleValue *pedestalContainer = calibration->getPedestal();
00488     if (_pedestalSubtraction == 1)
00489       {
00490         if (pedestalContainer == NULL) {
00491           streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << " SKIP -- no pedestal available: " << endl;
00492           return;
00493         }
00494         
00495         pedestal = pedestalContainer->getValue();
00496         
00497         /*
00498           What about the significance cut?
00499           need pedestal width !
00500         */
00501       }
00502     
00503 
00504     /*----------------------------------------------
00505       get temperature
00506     -----------------------------------------------*/   
00507     SimpleValue *temperatureObject = calibration->getTemperature();
00508     float temperature = 0;
00509     if (temperatureObject != NULL) temperature = temperatureObject->getValue();
00510     else
00511       {
00512         streamlog_out(ERROR)<<" No temperature found"<<endl;
00513         exit(1);
00514       }
00515     
00516     int cellID = calibration->getCellID();
00517     _mapper->getDecoder()->setCellIDEncoding(calibration->getCellIDEncoding());
00518     
00519     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  cellID: "<<cellID<<endl;
00520     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  from module " << _mapper->getModuleFromCellID(cellID) << endl;
00521     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  with amplitude: "<< rawEnergy << endl
00522                   << "  @ temperature: " << temperature << " deg. C" << endl;
00523 
00524     /*------------------------------------------------
00525       get MIP, gain and IC
00526       -----------------------------------------------*/
00527     
00528     /*---------------------- MIP ---------------------------------*/
00529     float mipValue = 0;
00530     
00531     if (_doMipTempCorr) mipValue = lfcMIP->eval(temperature);
00532     else
00533       mipValue = lfcMIP->getConstant();
00534     if (mipValue <= 0)
00535       {
00536         /*
00537           streamlog_out(ERROR0) << "  ERROR - ignoring cell with negative/"
00538           << "zero MIP coefficient at I/J/K "
00539           << _mapper->getDecoder()->getIFromCellID(cellID)
00540           <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getJFromCellID(cellID)
00541           <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(cellID)
00542           << endl;
00543         */
00544         return;
00545       }
00546 
00547 
00548     /*---------------------- gain ---------------------------------*/
00549     float gainValue = 0;
00550     if (_doGainTempCorr) gainValue = lfcGain->eval(temperature);
00551     else                 gainValue = lfcGain->getConstant();
00552     if (gainValue <= 0)
00553       {
00554         /*
00555           streamlog_out(ERROR0) << "  ERROR - ignoring cell with negative/"
00556           << "zero gain coefficient at I/J/K "
00557           << _mapper->getDecoder()->getIFromCellID(cellID)
00558           <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getJFromCellID(cellID)
00559           <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(cellID)
00560           << endl;
00561         */
00562         return;
00563       }
00564 
00565     float interCalibrationValue = interCalibContainer->getValue();
00566     if (interCalibrationValue <= 0)
00567       {
00568         streamlog_out(ERROR0) << "  ERROR - ignoring cell with negative/"
00569                       << "zero inter calibration at I/J/K "
00570                       << _mapper->getDecoder()->getIFromCellID(cellID)
00571                       <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getJFromCellID(cellID)
00572                       <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(cellID)
00573                       << endl;
00574         return;
00575       }
00576     
00577     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  - pedestal: " << pedestal << endl;
00578     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  - MIP: " << mipValue << endl;
00579     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  - gain: " << gainValue << endl;
00580     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  - intercalibration: " << interCalibrationValue << endl;
00581     
00582     
00583     //check if gainConstant or IC is default => put gainConst to have fixed LY.
00584     //This prevents an event to have the "strange" desaturated amplitudes        
00585     if ( _correctDefaultGainToLY && (bits.gainConstantIsDefault() || bits.interCalibrationIsDefault()) ) {
00586       gainValue = mipValue * interCalibrationValue / _fixedLY;
00587     } 
00588         
00589     /*----------------------------------------------
00590       do calibration
00591       ---------------------------------------------*/
00592     float calibratedEnergy      = 0;
00593 
00594     if ( _doSaturationCorr )
00595       {
00596         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<< "  - amplitude [pix]: " << rawEnergy * mipValue/gainValue * interCalibrationValue<<endl;
00597         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<< "  - corrected [pix]: " 
00598                      << saturationContainer->deSaturate( (rawEnergy - pedestal) 
00599                                                          * interCalibrationValue / gainValue )
00600                      <<endl;
00601 
00602         calibratedEnergy = saturationContainer->deSaturate( (rawEnergy - pedestal) * interCalibrationValue / gainValue )
00603           * gainValue / interCalibrationValue / mipValue;
00604 
00605         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  - saturationCorrectionFactor: "
00606                       << saturationContainer->deSaturate( (rawEnergy - pedestal) * interCalibrationValue / gainValue )
00607           / ( (rawEnergy - pedestal) * interCalibrationValue / gainValue)
00608                       << endl;
00609       }
00610     else
00611       {
00612         calibratedEnergy      = (rawEnergy - pedestal) / mipValue;
00613       }
00614     
00615     
00616    streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"  - calibratedEnergy[MIPs]: "<<calibratedEnergy<<endl;
00617     /*--------------------------------------
00618      * if requested, do error calculation
00619      ---------------------------------------*/
00620    float calibratedEnergyError = 0;
00621    if ( _doErrorCalculation ) 
00622       {
00623         if (_pedestalSubtraction == 1) pedestalError = pedestalContainer->getError();
00624         
00625         const float interCalibrationError = interCalibContainer->getError();;
00626         const float temperatureError = temperatureObject->getError();
00627         
00628         float mipError  = 0;
00629         float gainError = 0;
00630         if (_doMipTempCorr) mipError = lfcMIP->evalErr(temperature,temperatureError);
00631         else                mipError = lfcMIP->getConstantError();
00632         
00633         if (_doGainTempCorr) gainError = lfcGain->evalErr(temperature,temperatureError);
00634         else                 gainError = lfcGain->getConstantError();
00635         
00636         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  - MIP error: " << mipError << endl;
00637         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  - gain error: " << gainError << endl;
00638         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "  - intercalibration error: " << interCalibrationError << endl;
00639                 
00640         const float relativeErrorPedSubSquare = 
00641           ( pow(calibratedEnergyError, 2) + pow(pedestalError, 2) ) / pow( rawEnergy - pedestal, 2);
00642         
00643         /*----------------------------------------
00644           if requested, do saturation correction 
00645           ---------------------------------------*/
00646         if ( _doSaturationCorr ) 
00647           {
00648             const float saturatedSignalInPixel = (rawEnergy - pedestal) * interCalibrationValue / gainValue ;
00649             const float unsaturatedSignalInPixel = saturationContainer->deSaturate( saturatedSignalInPixel );
00650             
00651             /* assuming that the intercalibration error cancels in first order*/
00652             const float saturatedSignalInPixelError = 
00653               sqrt( relativeErrorPedSubSquare + pow(gainError/gainValue,2) ) * saturatedSignalInPixel;
00654             
00655             calibratedEnergyError =
00656               sqrt( pow(saturationContainer->deSaturatedError(saturatedSignalInPixel,
00657                                                               saturatedSignalInPixelError)/unsaturatedSignalInPixel,2)
00658                     + pow(mipError/mipValue,2) ) * calibratedEnergy;
00659           }
00660         else 
00661           {
00662             calibratedEnergyError =
00663               sqrt( relativeErrorPedSubSquare + pow(mipError/mipValue,2) ) * calibratedEnergy;
00664           }
00665       }
00666 
00667     /*-----------------------------------------------
00668       0.5 MIP cut
00669       ----------------------------------------------*/
00670     if ( _zeroSuppression &&  calibratedEnergy < _mipCut )
00671       {
00672         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << " STOP - " << calibratedEnergy 
00673                       << " - below threshold of: " << _mipCut << endl;
00674         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"  ------------------------------"<<endl;
00675         return;
00676       }
00677 
00678     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<< " DONE - calibrated amplitude: " << calibratedEnergy;
00679     if (_doErrorCalculation)  streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << " +- " << calibratedEnergyError;
00680     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<< endl;
00681  
00682     
00683   
00684     /*---------------------------------------------
00685       write output calorimeter hit
00686       --------------------------------------------*/
00687     CalorimeterHitImpl *newHit = new CalorimeterHitImpl();
00688     if (_scaleEnergy) 
00689       {
00690         newHit->setEnergy(     calibratedEnergy*_energyScaleFactor );
00691         newHit->setEnergyError(calibratedEnergyError*_energyScaleFactor );
00692       }
00693     else
00694       {
00695         newHit->setEnergy(calibratedEnergy);
00696         newHit->setEnergyError(calibratedEnergyError);
00697       }
00698     newHit->setCellID0(cellID);
00699 
00700     _cellDescriptions->getDecoder()->setCellIDEncoding(calibration->getCellIDEncoding());
00701     CellDescription* cellDescription = _cellDescriptions->getByCellID(cellID);
00702     float newPosition[3] = {cellDescription->getX(), cellDescription->getY(), cellDescription->getZ()};
00703     
00704     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" position: ("<<newPosition[0]<<", "<<newPosition[1]<<", "<<newPosition[2]<<std::endl;
00705     
00706     newHit->setPosition(newPosition);
00707      
00708     /*add collection of AHCal calibrated hits to the event*/
00709     ahcHitOutputCol->addElement(newHit);
00710 
00711     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" \n output collection "<<_ahcHitOutputColName<<" has "
00712              <<ahcHitOutputCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements"<<endl;
00713     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"=====================\n\n" << endl;
00714 
00715     /*----------------------------------------------------------------
00716       for the relation between CalorimeterHits and SimCalorimeterHits
00717       ------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00718     if (_createSimRecRelation == true)
00719             _recoContainer->fillByCellID(newHit->getCellID0(), newHit);
00720     
00721     /*--------------------------------------------------
00722       write output AHCal hit amplitude in different units
00723       -------------------------------------------------*/
00724     /*set the amplitude in the different units*/
00725     AhcAmplitude *ahcAmplitude = new AhcAmplitude(cellID,
00726                                                   rawEnergy,
00727                                                   rawEnergy - pedestal,
00728                                                   (rawEnergy - pedestal)/lfcMIP->eval(temperature),
00729                                                   (rawEnergy - pedestal)/lfcMIP->getConstant(),
00730                                                   calibratedEnergy * _mipToGeVFactor,
00731                                                   temperature);
00732   
00733     ahcAmplOutputCol->addElement(ahcAmplitude);
00734 
00735     LCParameters &paramAmpl = ahcAmplOutputCol->parameters();
00736     paramAmpl.setValue("DataDescription", ahcAmplitude->getDataDescription());
00737 
00738     /* ---------------------------------------------------------
00739       Set the relation between CalorimeterHit and AhcAmplitude
00740       -----------------------------------------------------------*/
00741     relationNavigator.addRelation(newHit, ahcAmplitude);
00742 
00743   }
00744 
00745   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00746   /*                                                             */
00747   /*                                                             */
00748   /*                                                             */
00749   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00750   void SiPMCalibrateProcessor::checkHitAmplRelation(LCEvent *evt)
00751   {
00752     LCCollection *relCol;
00753     try{
00754       relCol = evt->getCollection(_hitAmplRelationColName);
00755     }
00756     catch ( lcio::DataNotAvailableException err ) 
00757       {
00758         streamlog_out( WARNING )<<"Event "<<evt->getEventNumber() << ", no relation named "<<_hitAmplRelationColName<<" found" << endl;
00759         return ;
00760      }/*catch*/
00761 
00762     LCRelationNavigator relNav(relCol);
00763 
00764     LCCollection *hitCol = NULL;
00765     try
00766       {
00767         hitCol = evt->getCollection(_ahcHitOutputColName);
00768       }
00769     catch (EVENT::DataNotAvailableException &e)
00770       {
00771         streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "missing collection "
00772                       <<_ahcHitOutputColName<<endl<<e.what()<<endl;
00773         return;
00774       }
00775     
00776     for (int i = 0; i < hitCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00777       {
00778         CalorimeterHit *hit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(hitCol->getElementAt(i));
00779         const LCObjectVec &amplVec = relNav.getRelatedToObjects(hit);
00780         if (amplVec.size() > 0) 
00781           {     
00782             AhcAmplitude *ahcAmpl = dynamic_cast<AhcAmplitude*>(amplVec[0]);
00783             float amplGeV = ahcAmpl->getAmplGeV();
00784             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" ampl[GeV] = "<<amplGeV<<endl;
00785           } 
00786         else
00787           {
00788             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"empty AhcAmpl collection"<<endl;
00789           }
00790       }
00791    
00792   }
00793 
00794 
00795 
00796   /******************************************************************************/
00797   /*                                                                            */
00798   /*                                                                            */
00799   /*                                                                            */
00800   /******************************************************************************/
00801   void SiPMCalibrateProcessor::createSimRecRelation(LCEvent *evt)
00802   {
00803    const LCCollection *simHitCol = evt->getCollection( _simHitColName ) ;
00804     if (simHitCol == NULL)
00805       {
00806         streamlog_out(WARNING)<<" There is no collection named "<<_simHitColName
00807                       <<" which contains SimCalorimeterHits in this event ("
00808                       <<evt->getEventNumber()<<")"<<endl;
00809         return;
00810       }
00811 
00812     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n============================="<<endl;
00813     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"createSimRecRelation in event "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<endl;
00814 
00815     LCRelationNavigator relationNavigator(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT, LCIO::SIMCALORIMETERHIT);
00816 
00817     int counter = 0;
00818 
00819     /*set the Mokka encoding string*/
00820     const std::string mokkaEncodingString = simHitCol->getParameters().getStringVal(LCIO::CellIDEncoding);
00821     DecoderSet *decoder = _mapper->getDecoder();
00822     decoder->setCellIDEncoding(mokkaEncodingString);
00823 
00824     for (int iHit = 0; iHit < simHitCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++iHit)
00825        {
00826          SimCalorimeterHit *simHit = dynamic_cast<SimCalorimeterHit*>(simHitCol->getElementAt(iHit));
00827          int mokkaCellID = simHit->getCellID0();
00828          
00829          int trueCellID = 0;
00830 
00831          try
00832            {
00833              trueCellID = _mapper->getTrueCellID(mokkaCellID);
00834            }
00835          catch (BadDataException &e)
00836            {
00837              streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" invalid cell id "<<mokkaCellID<<endl<< e.what() << endl;
00838              continue;
00839            }
00840 
00841          CalorimeterHitImpl *recoHit = _recoContainer->getByCellID(trueCellID);
00842          
00843          streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"  i: "<<iHit<<" mokkaCellID="<<mokkaCellID<<" I/J/K="
00844                       <<_mapper->getDecoder()->getIFromCellID(mokkaCellID)
00845                       <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getJFromCellID(mokkaCellID)
00846                       <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(mokkaCellID)
00847                       <<", trueCellID="<<trueCellID
00848                       <<", I/J/K="<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getIFromCellID(trueCellID)
00849                       <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getJFromCellID(trueCellID)
00850                       <<"/"<<_mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(trueCellID)
00851                       <<" recoHit="<<recoHit
00852                       <<endl;
00853          
00854          if (recoHit != NULL)
00855            {
00856              counter++;
00857              relationNavigator.addRelation(recoHit, simHit);
00858            }
00859 
00860        }/*end loop over SimCalorimeterHits*/
00861 
00862     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n event: "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<" no sim hits: "<<simHitCol->getNumberOfElements()
00863                  <<" no rec hits: "<<counter
00864                  <<endl;
00865     
00866     evt->addCollection(relationNavigator.createLCCollection(), _simRecRelationColName);
00867 
00868   }
00869   
00870 }/*end of namespace CALICE*/
Generated on 1 Dec 2017 for RECOSIPM by  1.6.1
